SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.gridgain.grid.cache.datastructures
Interface GridCacheAtomicStamped<T,S>

All Superinterfaces:
GridMetadataAware, Serializable
public interface GridCacheAtomicStamped<T,S>
extends GridMetadataAware

This interface provides a rich API for working with distributed atomic stamped value.

Note that distributed atomic stamped is only available in Enterprise Edition.

Functionality

Distributed atomic stamped includes the following main functionality:
  • Method GridCacheAtomicStamped.get() synchronously gets both value and stamp of atomic.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicStamped.value() synchronously gets current value of atomic.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicStamped.stamp() synchronously gets current stamp of atomic.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicStamped.set(Object, Object) synchronously and unconditionally sets the value and the stamp in the atomic.
  • Methods compareAndSet(...) synchronously and conditionally set the value and the stamp in the atomic.
All previously described methods have asynchronous analogs.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicStamped.name() gets name of atomic stamped.

Creating Distributed Atomic Stamped

Instance of distributed atomic stamped can be created by calling one of the following methods:
  • GridCache.atomicStamped(String)
  • GridCache.atomicStamped(String, Object, Object)

Wiki & Forum:


Wiki
Forum

See Also:
GridCache.atomicStamped(String), GridCache.atomicStamped(String, Object, Object)

compareAndSet

boolean compareAndSet(T expVal,
                      T newVal,
                      S expStamp,
                      S newStamp)
                      throws GridException
Conditionally sets the new value and new stamp. They will be set if expVal and expStamp are equal to current value and current stamp respectively.

Throws:
GridException - If operation failed.
Parameters:
expVal - Expected value.
newVal - New value.
expStamp - Expected stamp.
newStamp - New stamp.
Returns:
Result of operation execution. If true than value and stamp will be updated.

newStampClos - Closure which generates new stamp value.
